content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for assistance with HVAC, plumbing, or electrical services?
Yeah, it’s my AC that’s having issues actually.
Thanks for letting me know. I can help get your AC issue sorted! May I have your name so I know how to address you?
Thank you, Amanda! Can I have your address to make sure you're within our service area for HVAC repairs?
I'm actually moving out soon, so I really don't want to put any money into fixing the AC. Sorry for bothering you.
reason: Customer is moving soon and does not wish to invest in repairs.

content: No problem at all, Amanda. If you ever need help in the future, feel free to reach out. Good luck with your move!
reason: Customer is moving soon and does not wish to invest in repairs.
